name: Dezdy
author: Burtay Arat

sections.description:
Dezdy (dezdy.com) is the leading cross platform native mobile commerce software solution (mCommerce) for any type of business. Whether B2B or B2C, using a mobile phone, web browser or a TV, Dezdy provides your customers who are on the go with an elegant, efficient and easy user experience. Happy customers, more orders, happy you!

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload folder namedezdy to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You will find Settings > Dezdy Application Key in your admin panel, where you can set the application key for your company registered on dezdy.com
  4. After setting application key, to add menu display on a page use following shortcode [dezdy_getmenu]
